```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggtext)
library(ggstream)
library(ggbump)
library(paletteer)
```
### Source[ggstream pacakge by davids joberg] (https://github.com/davidsjoberg/ggstream)

```{r}
stepcounts <- readr::read_csv("C:/Users/inkyscope/Documents/projectR/30DayChartChallenge/data/inkystepcounts.csv")

```


```{r}
df <- stepcounts %>% 
  mutate(year = year(date),
         month = month(date)) %>% 
  group_by(year, month) %>% 
  summarize(total_steps = sum(steps, na.rm = T),
            total_distance = sum(distance, na.rm = T),
            total_stairs = sum(stairs, na.rm = T),
            na.rm = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(total_distance = round(total_distance, 1),
         total_stairs = round(total_stairs, 0))
```


```{r}
plot_stream <- df %>% 
  filter(year %in% 2016:2019) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(factor(month), total_steps,
             fill = factor(year),
             group = factor(year))) +
  geom_stream() +
  scale_x_discrete(labels = month.abb) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::label_number_si()) +
  scale_fill_paletteer_d("rockthemes::janelle") +
  labs(x = "",
      y = "",
      title = "Total Monthly Step Counts",
      caption = "Source: Personal record | Graphic: Sung Inkyung") +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom",
        legend.title = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major.x = element_line(size = 0.4,
                                          color = "gray90"),
        panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank())
```

```{r}
plot_bump <- df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = month, y = total_stairs,
             color = factor(year))) +
  geom_point(size = 4) +
  geom_text(data = df %>% filter(month == 1),
            aes(x = month - .1, 
                label = paste0(year, " : ", total_distance)),
            hjust = 0,
            vjust = -1,
            size = 3.5,
            face = "bold",
            color = "gray70") +
  geom_text(data = df %>% filter(month == 12),
            aes(x = month + .1, 
                label = paste0(year, " : ", total_distance)),
            hjust = 0, 
            size = 3.5,
            face = "bold",
            color = "gray70") +
  geom_text(data = df %>% filter(month == 10 & year == 2021),
            aes(x = month + .1, 
                label = paste0(year, " : ", total_distance)),
            hjust = 0,
            size = 3.5,
            face = "bold",
            color = "gray70") +
  geom_bump(size = 1.5, 
            smooth = 8) +
  scale_x_continuous(
                     breaks = seq(1, 12, 1),
                     labels = c("1" = "Jan",
                                "2" = "Feb",
                                "3" = "Mar",
                                "4" = "Apr",
                                "5" = "May",
                                "6" = "Jun",
                                "7" = "Jul",
                                "8" = "Aug",
                                "9" = "Sep",
                                "10" = "Oct",
                                "11" = "Nov",
                                "12" = "Dec"),
                     position = "top") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 400),
                     breaks = seq(0, 400, 50)) +
  scale_color_paletteer_d("futurevisions::grand_tour") +
  labs(x = "",
       y = "Total Monthly Walking Stairs",
       title = "<span style = 'color: #418D87FF'> **2 0 1 5**</span> <span style = 'color: gray90'>**-**</span><span style = 'color: #F6EBD1FF'> **2 0 2 1**</span>",
       subtitle = "Total Monthly Walking Distance(km) vs Stairs: It turned out that they didn't always go together",
       caption = "Source: Personal record | Graphic: Sung Inkyung") +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        plot.background = element_rect(fill = "gray30",
                                       color = "gray30"),
        plot.title = element_markdown(size = 50,
                                      hjust = 0.5,
                                     margin = margin(b = 5)),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 20,
                                     color = "white",
                                     hjust = 0.5,
                                     margin = margin(b = 20)),                         
        plot.caption = element_text(size = 11,
                                    color = "white",
                                    hjust = 1, 
                                    margin = margin(t= 20, b = 5)),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 14,
                                   color = "gray90"),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 14,
                                   color = "gray90"),
        axis.title.y.left = element_text(size = 12,
                                         color = "white",
                                         vjust = 0.5,
                                         angle = 90),
        plot.margin = margin(10, 10, 10, 10))

ggsave(here::here("day6", "d6_experimental.png"), width = 50, height = 22, units = "cm")
 
```
